tetra.stats.speed.tooltip_extended:
挥动的“冷却”通过屏幕中央的攻击指示器显示。可以在冷却未完全完成前挥动，但攻击造成的伤害会更低。像扫击或打击的效果仅在攻击指示器完全充满后触发。

§7速度值作为采集效率的倍率，它决定了方块被破坏的速度，具体取决于该值是否高于或低于 1。倍率的计算方式如下：§f§o倍率 = 速度 * 0.5 + 0.5§r§7

垂直范围分为三个部分，中间部分覆盖 §e20 度§7 的范围。上部和下部部分覆盖所有大于 §e+-25 度§7 的区域，只有在垂直范围达到 §e50 度§7 或更大时，上部和下部部分才会激活
tetra.stats.holo.percussionScanner.toolt: 当全息球放置在地面上时启用扫描模式。在扫描模式下，使用锤子击打全息球可以扫描区块以寻找古代遗迹

区块在 §e40 度§7 的锥形范围内进行扫描，扫描方向基于玩家与全息球的相对位置，每次击打扫描 §e4§7 个区块。
 
锤子属性的加成：
 §e+ 12 度的锥形大小每个锤子等级§7
 §e+ 1/4 个区块每个锤子效率§7（不考虑速度修饰）
 
包含遗迹的区块将在扫描器界面中以橙色光束高亮显示。
tetra.stats.intuit.tooltip: 击杀实体和破坏方块获得的经验以 §e%s倍§r 的比例转化为打磨进度
tetra.stats.earthbind.tooltip: 击中实体有 §e10%§r 的几率将其锁定 §e%s 秒§r。此效果在较低的y层级下更常发生，在基岩层时可达 §e50%§r 的几率
tetra.stats.reaching.tooltip: 目标越远，采集速度和攻击伤害越高。距离目标 §e%s§r 方块时获得 §e+%s%%§r 的加成。
tetra.stats.reaching.tooltip_extended:
加成随着目标的距离增加而提高，遵循对数比例。对于远程攻击，伤害加成的计算因子为 §e%s倍§7。
 
最大加成：
§7采集速度： §e+%s%%§7（§e%s§7 方块）
§7攻击伤害： §e+%s%%§7（§e%s§7 方块）
tetra.stats.tool.reaching_sweeping.toolt: 被横扫效果破坏的方块硬度计算时视为被长臂的范围攻击乘数所除。
tetra.stats.janking.tooltip: 破坏方块或击杀实体会将掉落物传送到持有者身边，影响范围内 §e%s§r 方块半径内的物品和经验球。此效果发生时，有 §e%s%%§r 的几率生成末影螨。

tetra.stats.tool.efficiency.tooltip: 附魔增加采集效率，不受挥舞速度影响
tetra.stats.tool.tooltip_extended: 需要更高等级才能采集更硬的方块，并使用更坚硬的材料进行制作。效率决定了此物品破坏方块的速度。
tetra.stats.tool.striking.tooltip: 瞬间破坏击中的方块，受挥舞速度限制
tetra.stats.tool.sweeping.tooltip: 瞬间以弧形模式破坏多个方块，受挥舞速度限制。方块硬度和工具效率影响被破坏方块的数量。
tetra.stats.tool.sweeping.tooltip_extend: 效率（不包括速度修饰）决定了横扫效果的强度，每个被破坏的方块都会消耗一些强度，直到强度用尽为止。每个方块的消耗量计算为：方块硬度 + 0.05 * 撞击点与方块之间的曼哈顿距离，软方块的消耗量四舍五入为0.5。例如，效率为10且方块硬度为1.5（石头）时，每次横扫大约会破坏6个方块。
tetra.stats.tool.truesweepingStrike.tool: 在空中挥动物品会触发最大范围的横扫效果。
tetra.stats.tool.planarSweep.tooltip: 横扫效果在最近的平面上触发，并被限制为单个方块的高度。
tetra.stats.tool.sweepingFocus_width.too: 横扫弧形在宽度上优先于深度，优先级因子为 §e%s§r。
tetra.stats.tool.sweepingFocus_depth.too: 横扫弧形在深度上优先于宽度，优先级因子为 §e%s§r。
tetra.stats.tool.sweepingFocus.tooltip: 横扫弧形在深度和宽度之间平衡。
tetra.stats.tool.extraction.tooltip: 在破坏一个方块时，以3x3的半径破坏 §e%s§7 个方块。此物品会因该效果的强度而承受额外的耐久损伤。
tetra.stats.tool.unboundExtraction.toolt: 在破坏一个方块时，随机破坏 §e%s§7 个附近的方块。此物品会因该效果的强度而承受额外的耐久损失。
tetra.stats.medialLimit.tooltip: 限制提取器效果在纵轴上扩展超过 §e%s§r 个方块
tetra.stats.medialLimit.tooltip_extended: 纵轴指的是在水平面上向上或向下
tetra.stats.lateralLimit.tooltip: 限制提取器效果在横轴上扩展超过 §e%s§r 个方块
tetra.stats.lateralLimit.tooltip_extende: 横轴指的是向左或向右，提取器效果可以向两侧破坏方块的距离
tetra.stats.axialLimit.tooltip: 限制提取器效果在轴向上扩展超过 §e%s§r 个方块
tetra.stats.axialLimit.tooltip_extended: 轴向指的是沿着持有者面向的方向，提取器效果可以向前（或向后）破坏方块的距离

item.tetra.scroll.warforge.details:
§l§n战争锻造§r

战争锻造一个双头工具使其在战斗中更有效，这提供了：

 + 一个基于战锻头的 §l被动§r 属性或效果

 + 基于左头的右键 §l技能§r

 + 基于右头的技能 §l修饰符§r§l§n战斧§r

§l被动:§r 割裂
攻击有机会减少目标的最大生命值

§l技能:§r 斩杀
根据缺失的生命值和有害效果造成额外伤害

§l修饰符:§r 过充
技能可以进一步充能以增加伤害和改善效果§l§n战锤§r

§l被动:§r 粉碎
攻击部分忽略护甲和吸收效果

§l技能:§r 猛击
对单个目标进行强力击退攻击，或在大范围内攻击多个敌人

§l修饰符:§r 势头
使技能击晕目标或将其击退更远§l§n战镐§r

§l被动:§r 刺穿
攻击对无甲目标造成额外伤害

§l技能:§r 穿刺
减少目标的护甲或使其流血

§l修饰符:§r 连击
从普通攻击中获得连击点，以改善技能§l§n工具尾部§r

§l被动:§r 轻盈
提供显著的速度提升，但降低工具等级

§l技能:§r 无

§l修饰符:§r 轻盈
减少技能充能时间和冷却时间§l§n爪子§r

§l被动:§r 穿甲
攻击部分忽略护甲

§l技能:§r 撬
对目标施加叠加护甲减益效果

§l修饰符:§r 复仇
在持有者处于劣势时提升技能§l§n割锄§r

§l被动:§r 伤害加成
增加整体武器伤害

§l技能:§r 超强
造成高额伤害，但会使目标和持有者都感到疲惫

§l修饰符:§r 过度扩展
技能更有效，但会消耗额外的食物§l§n战镰§r

§l被动:§r 扫击
增加扫击伤害和范围

§l技能:§r 收割
在一个区域内击中目标，击杀会提升持有者

§l修饰符:§r 激励
成功使用时提升技能§l§n战斧§r

§l被动:§r 伤害加成
显著增加斧头的伤害

§l技能:§r 冲刺
向前冲刺并对第一个命中的目标造成伤害

§l修饰符:§r 防御
当物品在副手使用时，技能提供防御加成

Progression towards honing this item
 
§7Progress: §e%s§7/§e%s §7(§e%s§7)

Progress increase as the item is used, once complete one of the item's major modules can be honed to slightly increase one of its stats. The base requirement and the integrity penalty varies slightly depending on the type of the item (e.g. sword, bow, or double headed tool). An item has to be modified or repaired in a workbench for the honing progression to start (if the hone progress bar is visible then it's working).

tetra.modular.synergy_indicator.empty: This module has no potential synergy bonuses
tetra.modular.aspects.header: This module has the following aspects:
tetra.modular.aspects.missing_descriptio: There is no description for this aspect
tetra.aspect.armor.description: A key part of a piece of armor, accepts enchantments that would typically go on armor regardless of slot (like protection enchantments)
tetra.aspect.armor_feet.description: A key part of a piece of feet armor, allows the module to accept feet-related enchantments
tetra.aspect.armor_legs.description: A key part of a piece of leg armor, allows the module to accept related enchantments
tetra.aspect.armor_chest.description: A key part of a piece of feet armor, allows the module to accept chest-related enchantments
tetra.aspect.armor_head.description: A key part of a piece of feet armor, allows the module to accept head-related enchantments
tetra.aspect.edged_weapon.description: A key part of an edged weapon, accepts enchantments that would typically go on a sword
tetra.aspect.blunt_weapon.description: A key part of a blunt weapon, accepts enchantments that would typically go on a sword (but not sharpness)
tetra.aspect.pointy_weapon.description: A key part of a pointy weapon, accepts enchantments that would typically go on a trident (apart from enchantments related to throwing)
tetra.aspect.throwable.description: A key part of a tool or weapon that's throwable, accepts enchantments and improvements related to throwing
tetra.aspect.block_breaker.description: Involved in or directly used for breaking blocks and accepts enchantments and improvements related to breaking blocks, like the efficiency or fortune enchantments
tetra.aspect.breakable.description: This module can (or is part of something that can) break, it accepts enchantments and improvements related to durability
tetra.aspect.bow.description: A key part of what makes a bow, allows the module to accept bow-related enchantments
tetra.aspect.crossbow.description: A key part of what makes crossbow, allows the module to accept bow-related enchantments
tetra.aspect.wearable.description: A key part of something that can be worn, the module accepts Curse of Binding (and potentially other modded enchantments that can be applied based on the same ruleset)
tetra.aspect.vanishable.description: This module accepts Curse of Vanishing (and potentially other modded enchantments that can be applied based on the same ruleset)
tetra.aspect.blazing.description: This module is related to setting the wielder (or wearer) on fire and may accept related improvements
tetra.aspect.reverberating.description: This module affects how the wielder (or wearer) interacts with denizen or objects of the end and may accept related improvements
tetra/schematic/repair.name: Repair
tetra/schematic/repair.description: Patch up damaged and worn modules. Cycles through the modules of the item, repairing one module at a time.
tetra/schematic/repair.description_detai:
Patch up damaged and worn modules. Cycles through the modules of the item, repairing one module at a time.

tetra/schematic/cleanse.name: Cleanse
tetra/schematic/cleanse.description:
Cleanse negative effects caused by magic instability.
 
Experience cost is increased based on exceeded magic capacity and the amount of instability effects.

tetra/schematic/sword/basic_blade.name: Basic blade
tetra/schematic/sword/basic_blade.descri: Replace the current sword blade with the given blade, or reforge it using raw materials.
tetra.module.sword/basic_blade.name: Basic blade
tetra.module.sword/basic_blade.descripti: A basic blade with average damage, attack speed and integrity usage.
tetra.improvement.blade/serrated.name: Serrated blade
tetra.improvement.blade/hooked.name: Hooked blade
tetra.improvement.blade/hooked.descripti: Hitting enemies from behind cause critical damage
tetra.improvement.blade/tempered.name: Tempered point
tetra/schematic/sword/shared_blade/serra:
Serrates the blade, providing a saw-tooth edged blade. Has a 30%% chance to cause the target to bleed for 4 damage over 2 seconds.
 
§lNot effective against undead.
Hone the serrated improvement, increases the damage dealt.
Further hone the serrated improvement, increases the damage dealt.
tetra/schematic/sword/shared_blade/tempe: Temper the point of the blade, greatly increasing its hardness. Causes some of the damage dealt to ignore armor.
Further temper the blade to improve the armor penetration effect.
Further temper the blade to improve the armor penetration effect.
tetra/schematic/sword/shared_blade/hooke: Carve a hook into the back side of the blade, providing additional damage when hitting unsuspecting enemies. Cause critical strikes when attacking enemies from behind.
Hone the hooked improvement, increases the bonus damage dealt when hitting enemies from behind to 75%%.
Further hone the hooked improvement, increases the bonus damage dealt when hitting enemies from behind to 125%%.
tetra/schematic/sword/basic_hilt/basic_h: Replaces the current hilt with a new one crafted from the provided material.
tetra.module.sword/basic_hilt.name: Simple hilt
tetra.module.sword/basic_hilt.descriptio: A simple sword hilt. The sword hilt is the primary source of integrity for swords.
tetra.improvement.basic_hilt/soot.name: Sooted
tetra.improvement.hilt/wrap.name: %s wrap
tetra.improvement.hilt/wrap.description: Slightly increases damage and speed, reduces negative hilt effects.
tetra/schematic/sword/basic_hilt/wrap_hi: Wrap the hilt using the provided materials. Slighly increases damage and speed, and reduces negative effects potentially caused by the hilt.
tetra.module.sword/decorative_pommel.des: A decorative pommel, it provides a small amount of durability but has no functional value.
tetra.module.sword/makeshift_guard.name: Makeshift guard
tetra.module.sword/makeshift_guard.descr: A sword guard, its weak construction provides little protection for the wielding hand.
tetra/schematic/sword/wide_guard.name: Wide guard
tetra/schematic/sword/wide_guard.descrip: Craft a wide guard which protects the wielding hand, providing additional armor when held in the mainhand or offhand.
tetra.module.sword/wide_guard.name: Wide guard
tetra.module.sword/wide_guard.descriptio: a wide guard which protects the wielding hand. Provides additional armor when the sword is held in the mainhand or offhand.
tetra/schematic/sword/sturdy_guard.name: Sturdy guard
tetra/schematic/sword/sturdy_guard.descr: Craft a sturdy guard which can block incoming attacks if timed correctly.
tetra.module.sword/sturdy_guard.name: Sturdy guard
tetra.module.sword/sturdy_guard.descript: A sturdy guard which can block incoming attacks if timed correctly.
tetra/schematic/sword/decorative_guard.d: Craft a decorative guard, it's purely cosmetic and only affects the appearance of the item
tetra.module.sword/decorative_guard.name: Decorative guard
tetra.module.sword/decorative_guard.desc: A decorative guard, it's purely cosmetic and only affects the appearance of the item
tetra/schematic/sword/socket.name: Socket
tetra/schematic/sword/socket.description: Socket a gem into the sword, providing different effects depending on the gem.
tetra.module.sword/socket.name: Socket
tetra.module.sword/socket.description: A gem, fitted onto the sword where the blade meets the hilt. The gem is enchanted and provides magical boons to the wielder of the sword.
tetra/schematic/sword/perk_socket_0.name: Ornate socket
tetra/schematic/sword/perk_socket_0.desc:
Socket a gem into the sword, providing different effects depending on the gem.

This ornate version of the socket is made available to those who have supported the project, thank you.
tetra.module.sword/perk_socket_0.name: Socket
tetra.module.sword/perk_socket_0.descrip: An ornately fitted gemstone. The gem is enchanted and provides magical boons to the wielder of the sword.
tetra/schematic/sword/counterweight.name: Counterweight
tetra/schematic/sword/counterweight.desc: Balance the blade with a counterweight. Increases the attack speed by §f0.15§r, this bonus is reduced by §f0.05§r for each point of difference between the total integrity use and the effect level.
tetra.module.sword/counterweight.name: Counterweight
tetra.module.sword/counterweight.descrip: A counterweight attached to the bottom of the hilt. Increases the attack speed by 0.15 if the counterweight effect level matches the total integrity for the item, the bonus is reduced by 0.05 for each point of difference between the integrity use and the effect level.
Reinforce the fuller using the given material. Provides additional integrity and reduces the chance for the item to take damage, but makes the sword heavier and slower to swing.
tetra.module.sword/reinforced_fuller.des: A fuller reinforcement that provides additional integrity and reduces the chance for the item to take damage, but makes the sword heavier and slower to swing.
tetra/schematic/sword/howling.name: Howling blade
tetra/schematic/sword/howling.descriptio: Craft a set of fuller attachments that will cause howling winds to envelop the wielder when the sword is swung, the winds will occasionally deflect incoming projectiles.
tetra.module.sword/howling.name: Howlers
tetra.module.sword/howling.description: A fuller attachment that causes howling winds to envelop the wielder, the winds occasionally deflects incoming projectiles.
tetra/schematic/sword/binding.name: Binding
tetra/schematic/sword/binding.descriptio: Tighten the binding between the hilt and the blade by wrapping it with rope or straps, or by using completely different materials and methods.
tetra.module.sword/binding.name: Binding
tetra.module.sword/binding.description: Tightly bound fibre strengthen the blade's attachment to the hilt.
tetra.variant.sword_binding/bolt.descrip: An adjustable bolt attaches the blade to the hilt.
tetra.tweak.sword_tweak/binding_bolt.too:
§eTighten§r the bolt to make the sword more stiff, increasing damage.
§eLoosen§r the bolt to allow for a softer rebound, effectively increasing durability.
tetra/schematic/sword/forefinger_ring.de: Attach a ring at the top of the hilt, greatly increasing grip. Increases the minimum damage dealt when swinging too fast.
tetra.module.sword/forefinger_ring.name: Forefinger ring
tetra.module.sword/forefinger_ring.descr: A ring has been attached at the top of the hilt. The ring allows for a better grip, increasing the minimum damage dealt when swinging too fast.
tetra/schematic/sword/grip_loop.name: Grip loop
tetra/schematic/sword/grip_loop.descript: Attach a loop at the end of the hilt. The loop increases the area for sweeping attacks and slightly increases attack range.
tetra.module.sword/grip_loop.name: Grip loop
tetra.module.sword/grip_loop.description: A loop attached at the end of the hilt that increases the reach of the sword. Also increases the range of sweeping attacks by 2 blocks.
tetra/schematic/sword/short_blade.name: Shortblade
tetra/schematic/sword/short_blade.descri: Craft a light and short blade that can be used for crafting and for offhand attacks.
tetra.module.sword/short_blade.name: Shortblade
tetra.module.sword/short_blade.descripti: A light and short blade that can be used for crafting and for offhand attacks.
tetra/schematic/sword/heavy_blade.name: Heavy blade
tetra/schematic/sword/heavy_blade.descri: Replace the current sword blade with a large and hefty blade that always sweeps on fully charged swings.
tetra.module.sword/heavy_blade.name: Heavy blade
tetra.module.sword/heavy_blade.descripti: A large and hefty blade that sacrifices attack speed for increased damage, always sweeps on fully charged swings.
tetra/schematic/sword/machete.name: Machete
tetra/schematic/sword/machete.descriptio: Replace the current sword blade with a machete which can be used to cut down web and some types of plants in an area.
tetra.module.sword/machete.name: Machete
tetra.module.sword/machete.description:
A machete which can be used to cut down plants in an area.
 
The machete works different from other tools as it instantly harvests blocks but only if it's not on swing cooldown.
tetra/schematic/sword/stonecutter/stonec: Replace the current blade with the stonecutter, a heavy blade that cuts through stone with ease.
tetra.module.sword/stonecutter.name: Stonecutter
tetra.module.sword/stonecutter.descripti: A heavy blade that cuts through stone with ease.
tetra/schematic/sword/unbound_stonecutte: Craft an inert stonecutter using the provided materials. The stonecutter functions similar to a regular pickaxe, but it can be empowered with an Echo Shard which allows it to break multiple blocks in wide sweeps.
tetra.module.sword/unbound_stonecutter.d: A heavy blade that can cut through stone. Capable of breaking several blocks at a time once empowered.
tetra/schematic/sword/unbound_stonecutte: Empower the earthpiercer with an Echo Shard, increasing it's efficiency and allowing it to break several blocks at a time but gives it a small chance to spread sculk taint when used.
tetra.improvement.unbound_stonecutter/in: This stonecutter is inert, it needs to be empowered to unlock it's full potential
tetra/schematic/sword/unbound_stonecutte: Fracture the Echo Shard, increasing efficiency and the amount of blocks the earthpiercer breaks, but also makes it more likely to cause sculk taint.
Further fracture the Echo Shard, increasing efficiency and the amount of blocks the earthpiercer breaks, but also makes it more likely to cause sculk taint.
Further fracture the Echo Shard, increasing efficiency and the amount of blocks the earthpiercer breaks, but also makes it more likely to cause sculk taint.
tetra.improvement.unbound_stonecutter/fr: The echo shard has been fractured, increasing potency
tetra/schematic/sword/unbound_stonecutte: Fully shatter the Echo Shard, allowing it to break blocks without touching them. The instability effect is reduced based on how far the shard has been fractured.
tetra.improvement.unbound_stonecutter/sh: Empowered with a shattered Echo shard, the blade is covered in sculk veins
The Echo Shard has been shattered without proper fracturing
tetra/schematic/sword/unbound_stonecutte: Upgrade the Stonecutter using a Planar Stabilizer, the stabilizer guides the Stonecutter to cut along the nearest plane when swung.
tetra.improvement.unbound_stonecutter/pl: Assists the wielder in cutting along the nearest plane
tetra/schematic/sword/unbound_stonecutte: Modify the Stonecutter using a couple of bolts, allows the shape of the Stonecutter's area of effect to be tweaked.
tetra.improvement.unbound_stonecutter/ad: Allows the Stonecutter's area of effect to be tweaked
tetra.tweak.unbound_stonecutter/adjustab: Shift the focus of the Stonecutter's arc between width and depth
tetra/schematic/sword/unbound_stonecutte: Magically bind the Echo Shard to the earthpiercer, making it less likely to cause sculk taint but also using up some magic capacity.

tetra/schematic/double/basic_axe/basic_a: Craft an axe head from the given material. The axe can be used to break wooden blocks, for stripping logs and to disable shields.
tetra.module.double/basic_axe.name: Axe head
tetra.module.double/basic_axe.descriptio:
A basic axe head that can be used to break wooden blocks like planks and logs, to strip bark from logs,for crafting item modules from wood and to disable shields.
 
Double axe heads provide synergy bonuses.
tetra.improvement.basic_axe/severing.des: Deals bonus damage to unarmored targets
tetra/schematic/double/basic_pickaxe/bas:
Craft a pickaxe head That can be used for mining.
 
Double pickaxe heads provide an additional §fpickaxe tier§r.
tetra.module.double/basic_pickaxe.name: Pickaxe head
tetra.module.double/basic_pickaxe.descri:
A basic pickaxe head that can be used for mining.
 
Using double pickaxe heads makes the pickaxe able to break tougher blocks.
tetra/schematic/double/butt/butt.name: Tool butt
tetra/schematic/double/butt/butt.descrip: Used as the back side of a single sided tool, typically yields faster swing speed than a double sided tool.
tetra.module.double/butt.name: Tool butt
tetra.module.double/butt.description: The back side of a single sided tool, typically yields faster swing speed than a double sided head.
tetra/schematic/double/extractor/extract: Repurpose a chthonic extractor to allow the tool to break several blocks at a time.
tetra.module.double/extractor.name: Extractor
tetra.module.double/extractor.descriptio: A repurposed horse extractor, allows the tool to break several blocks at a time.

tetra/schematic/double/unbound_extractor: Freely craft an extractor attachment using an Echo Shard. Randomly causes nearby nearby blocks to break when harvesting a block, but gives the tool a small chance to spread sculk taint when used. The extractor can be honed and improved in various ways.
tetra.module.double/unbound_extractor.de: An freely crafted extractor attachment, boasts increased power but lacks some of the safety measurements and flair of the ancient extractors

tetra/schematic/double/basic_hammer/basi:
Craft a hammer head which can be used for crafting modular items, and for salvaging.
 
Hammer tier level doesn't follow the typical material progression. Double hammer heads provide an additional §fhammer tier§r.

tetra.module.double/basic_hammer.descrip:
The hammer head can be used when crafting modular items, and is sometimes used for salvaging.
 
Double hammer heads provide synergy bonuses.
tetra/schematic/double/adze/adze.name: Adze head

tetra.module.double/adze.name: Adze head

tetra/schematic/double/claw/claw.name: Claw
tetra/schematic/double/claw/claw.descrip: Craft a claw from the given material. The claw can be used for prying things open and to quickly break most wooden blocks.

tetra.module.double/hoe.name: Hoe
tetra.module.double/hoe.description: A basic hoe, useful for tilling soil.
tetra/schematic/double/sickle/sickle.des:
Craft a sickle which can be used to cut down plants in an area.
 
Works different from other tools as it instantly harvests blocks but only if it's not on swing cooldown.
tetra.module.double/sickle.name: Sickle
tetra.module.double/sickle.description:
A slightly arched sickle which can be used to cut blocks in an area.
 
Works different from other tools as it instantly harvests blocks but only if it's not on swing cooldown.
tetra/schematic/single/handle/basic_hand: Replace the handle with a basic handle crafted from the given materials.

§eTighten§r the bolt to make the tool more rigid, increasing harvest efficiency.

tetra.module.single/basic_shovel.descrip: A basic shovel head that can primarily be used to dig into the earth, but it's also useful for making dirt paths.

tetra.module.single/trident.name: Trident

tetra.toolbelt.effect.tooltip.quick.quic: A suitable tool can be quickly drawn from this slot
tetra.toolbelt.effect.tooltip.quiver.qui: Arrows can be drawn straight from this slot
tetra.toolbelt.effect.tooltip.storage.qu: Items can be restocked into this slot
tetra.toolbelt.effect.tooltip.storage.ce: Modules can draw power from cells in this slot
tetra/schematic/toolbelt/belt/belt_0.des: A rope and some leather scraps proved to be a great way to gain easy access to one of your tools, but the rope lacks the strength to support additional tools. Weaving a sash out of wool should provide better support than simply tying a rope around your waist.
tetra/schematic/toolbelt/belt/belt_1.des: With the proper tools at hand you should be able to cut leather into a long strap, which should prove even stronger than a belt fashioned from wool.
tetra/schematic/toolbelt/belt/belt_2.des: A buckle instead of a knot should provide additional support for carrying things around your waist.
tetra/schematic/toolbelt/belt/belt_3.des: Shulker shells proved exceptional as support when carrying chests, inlaying shells into the belt should further increase its integrity.
tetra.module.toolbelt/belt.name: Toolbelt
tetra.variant.belt/rope.name: Rope
tetra.variant.belt/rope.description: A very basic waistband fashioned from a rope. Can hold a very limited amount of attachments.
tetra.module.toolbelt/belt_wool.name: Wool sash
tetra.module.toolbelt/belt_wool.descript: A woolen sash that can hold a small amount of attachments.
tetra.variant.belt/leather.name: Wrap
tetra.variant.belt/leather.description: A sturdy leather strap that can be wrapped around ones waist. Can hold a decent amount of attachments.
tetra.variant.belt/buckled.description: A sturdy leather belt, locked in place with a buckle. Can hold a large amount of attachments.
tetra.variant.belt/inlaid.description: A sturdy leather belt that has been inlaid with shulker shells. Can hold an impressive amount of attachments.
tetra/schematic/toolbelt/strap/strap_1.d: Attach a single strap to the belt, which can be used for carrying and quickly accessing tools or other items.
tetra/schematic/toolbelt/strap/strap_2.d: Attach two straps to the belt, which can be used for carrying and quickly accessing tools or other items.
tetra/schematic/toolbelt/strap/strap_3.d: Attach three straps to the belt, which can be used for carrying and quickly accessing tools or other items.
tetra/schematic/toolbelt/strap/strap_4.d: Attach four straps to the belt, which can be used for carrying and quickly accessing tools or other items.
tetra.variant.strap1/leather.description: A leather strap that can be used to hang an item off the belt, allowing quick access to a frequently used tool or weapon.
tetra.variant.strap1/iron.description: An iron loop that can be used to hang an item off the belt, allowing quick access to a frequently used tool or weapon.
tetra.variant.strap2/leather.description: Two leather straps that can be used to hang items off the belt, allowing quick access to frequently used tools or weapons.
tetra.variant.strap2/iron.description: Two iron loops that can be used to hang items off the belt, allowing quick access to frequently used tools or weapons.
tetra.variant.strap3/leather.description: Three leather straps that can be used to hang items off the belt, allowing quick access to frequently used tools or weapons.
tetra.variant.strap3/iron.description: Three iron loops that can be used to hang items off the belt, allowing quick access to frequently used tools or weapons.
tetra.variant.strap4/leather.description: Four leather straps that can be used to hang items off the belt, allowing quick access to frequently used tools or weapons.
tetra.variant.strap4/iron.description: Four iron loops that can be used to hang items off the belt, allowing quick access to frequently used tools or weapons.
Attach a small bag specifically designed for carrying potions. The bag stores a large amount of potions, but can only support a small set of different types of potions.
tetra.module.toolbelt/potion_storage.des: A small bag specifically designed for carrying potions. The bag stores a large amount of potions, but can only support a small set of different types of potions.
tetra/schematic/toolbelt/storage/storage: Attach a small pouch to the toolbelt, which can store a decent amount of items. The contents of the pouch are not available using the toolbelt's quick access functionality.
tetra.module.toolbelt/storage.name: Storage pouch
tetra.module.toolbelt/storage.descriptio: A small pouch which can store a decent amount of items. The contents of the pouch are not available using the toolbelt's quick access functionality.
tetra/schematic/toolbelt/quiver/quiver.d: Craft a quiver attachment for the toolbelt. The quiver can hold a large amount of arrows that can be accessed using the toolbelt's quick access functionality. Can be upgraded with a quick latch which allows arrows to be drawn directly from the quiver.
tetra.module.toolbelt/quiver.name: Quiver
tetra.module.toolbelt/quiver.description: A quiver that can hold a large amount of arrows, can be accessed using the toolbelt's quick access functionality.
tetra/schematic/toolbelt/booster.name: Booster
tetra/schematic/toolbelt/booster.descrip: Attach a booster unit, which grants the ability to jump long distances or even fly for shorter periods of time. Activate by crouching before a jump, or by jumping mid-air or while flying with an elytra. §oUses gunpowder from toolbelt inventories as fuel.
tetra.module.toolbelt/booster.name: Booster
tetra.module.toolbelt/booster.descriptio: A booster unit which grants the ability to jump long distances or even fly for shorter periods of time. Activate by crouching before a jump, or by jumping mid-air or while flying with an elytra. §oUses gunpowder from toolbelt inventories as fuel.
tetra/schematic/toolbelt/suspender.name: Planar suspender
tetra/schematic/toolbelt/suspender.descr: Slightly modifying a planar stabilizer and attaching it to a belt allows it to draw power from a nearby beacon or conduit to suspend the belt's wearer in the air.
tetra.module.toolbelt/suspender.name: Planar suspender
tetra.module.toolbelt/suspender.descript: A modified planar stabilizer that can draw power from a nearby beacon or conduit to suspend the belt's wearer in the air
tetra/schematic/toolbelt/strap/quickslot:
Using a quick latch mechanism for locking the strap in place allows faster access to the tool held by the strap.
 
§7Tapping the toolbelt access hotkey will attempt to equip the first item suitable for breaking or salvaging the block you're looking at. Tools can only be equipped from slots with this upgrade.
tetra.improvement.strap/quick_latch.name: Quick latch
tetra.improvement.strap/quick_latch.desc: Tapping the toolbelt hotkey will quickly equip the most suitable tool from this inventory.
tetra/schematic/toolbelt/quiver/quickslo:
Upgrade the quiver with a quick latch mechanism, allowing quicker access to arrows in the quiver.
 
§7Drawing a bow with no ammo available will automatically grab an arrow from the first stack in the quiver.
tetra.improvement.quiver/quick_latch.des: Arrows will be automatically drawn from this quiver when no ammo is available.
tetra/schematic/toolbelt/storage/quicksl:
Upgrade the pouch with a quick latch mechanism, making it easier to stash items into it.
 
§7Held items can be put into the pouch using the restock hotkey.
tetra.improvement.storage/quick_latch.de: Held items can be stashed into the pouch using the restock hotkey.
Replaces the bowstring with a new basic bowstring crafted from the given materials. The bowstring is the primary source of integrity for bows.
tetra.module.bow/basic_string.name: Basic string
tetra.module.bow/basic_string.descriptio: A basic bowstring. The bowstring is the primary source of integrity for bows.
tetra/schematic/bow/stave/straight_stave: Replaces the stave with a straight stave crafted from the given materials.
tetra.module.bow/straight_stave.name: Straight stave
tetra/schematic/bow/stave/long_stave.des: Replaces the stave with a long stave crafted from the given materials. Longbows typically have a slower draw speed but deal more damage.
tetra.module.bow/long_stave.name: Long stave
tetra.module.bow/long_stave.description: A long bow stave. Longbows typically have a slower draw speed but deal more damage than other bows.
Replaces the stave with a recurve stave crafted from the given materials. Recurve bows have a faster draw speed than other types of bows, but does not fire with the same accuracy.
tetra.module.bow/recurve_stave.name: Recurve stave

tetra.module.bow/laminated_stave.name: Laminated stave

tetra/schematic/shield/sturdy_boss.name: Sturdy boss

tetra.module.shield/sturdy_boss.name: Sturdy boss
tetra.module.shield/sturdy_boss.descript: A sturdy boss that allows the shield to be used to bash entities.
tetra/schematic/shield/spike.name: Spike
tetra/schematic/shield/spike.description: Craft a shield spike from the given materials. Blocking melee attacks has a chance to damage the attacker.
tetra.module.shield/spike.name: Spike

tetra.advancements.story.more_upgrades.d:
Craft a wooden hammer from two sticks and two planks
 
§8§oTetra begins
tetra.advancements.spelunking.root.title: Spelunking (§7Tetra§r)
tetra.advancements.spelunking.ancient_ru: Find ancient ruins deep down in cold or mountainous biomes
tetra.advancements.spelunking.sweeper.de: Use a workbench to restore the sweeping capabilities of the holosphere scanner, the sweeper makes it easier to pinpoint the location of an ancient ruin
tetra.advancements.spelunking.percussion: Use a workbench to restore the percussion scanning capabilities of the holosphere scanner, place it in the world and enable scan mode, then hit it with a hammer to scan chunks for ancient ruins
tetra.advancements.spelunking.containers: Hit the highlighted areas on crates and containers with the correct tools to break them open
tetra.advancements.spelunking.chthonic_e: Find a chthonic extractor in a crate or a container
tetra.advancements.spelunking.chthonic_a: Place a forge hammer above an extractor and power it with redstone to automatically hammer it into the bedrock
tetra.advancements.spelunking.chthonic_c: Pour water on an extractor or let it sit for a while to avoid taking fire damage when picking it up

Fire a chthonic extractor using a crossbow with high draw strength

§7Hold the extractor in the offhand to load
tetra.advancements.spelunking.chthonic_h: Place a chthonic extractor on bedrock and hit the top with a hammer
tetra.advancements.spelunking.chthonic_m:
Replace the right head of a double headed tool with a chthonic extractor for a powerful harvesting tool

§7* The extractor has to be unused
* Unlike other artifacts found in the ruins this cannot be repaired with metal scrap
tetra.advancements.spelunking.earthpierc: Find an earthpiercer in a container and attach it to a handle, the earthpiercer can break several blocks in a line
tetra.advancements.spelunking.stonecutte: Find a stonecutter in a container and attach it to a hilt, the stonecutter can cut through stone in wide swathes
Enchant a stonecutter with the efficiency enchantment to increase the amount of blocks broken in each sweep
Salvage some bolts from the ancient ruins
Find a thermal cell in the ancient ruins
tetra.advancements.spelunking.find_latch: Salvage a quick latch from the ancient ruins and use it to improve a toolbelt attachment
tetra.advancements.spelunking.find_plana: Find a planar stabilizer in the ancient ruins
tetra.advancements.spelunking.suspend_be: Use a planar stabilizer to craft a powerful belt attachment
tetra.advancements.spelunking.suspend_bo: Use two planar stabilizers to craft a bow stabilizer
tetra.advancements.spelunking.geode.desc:
Find a geode when mining deepslate

§7Deepslate containing geodes glimmer in the presence of light
tetra.advancements.spelunking.geode_open: Upgrade a mallet and use it to break open a geode at a workbench
tetra.advancements.spelunking.hammer_fix:
Fix up a forge hammer by attaching two charged thermal cells and two upgrades

§7The sides of the hammer will be lit up when it's functional
tetra.advancements.spelunking.hammer_jam: Experience a forge hammer head jam, the hammer will not be usable until the head is un-jammed
tetra.advancements.spelunking.hammer_unj: Smack a jammed hammer head with a handheld hammer of at least tier 4 to get the forge hammer back into a working state
tetra.advancements.spelunking.hammer_pow:
Attach a combustion chamber to a forge hammer to increase its hammer tier by 1

§7Hammer upgrades like the combustion chamber can be found in crates and containers
tetra.advancements.spelunking.hammer_cra: Use a forge hammer to craft a module requiring tier 5+ hammering
tetra.advancements.spelunking.hammer_rem: Use a claw to remove an upgrade from a forge hammer
tetra.advancements.spelunking.schematic_: Replace all of the ruined pieces of an ancient schematic with intact ones to unlock powerful tools

Use an Echo Shard to empower an inert Stonecutter or Earthpiercer to unlock its full potential

§7Looted Stonecutters and Earthpiercers come pre-empowered, this advancements refers to the empowering of their crafted counterparts
Use a claw on the backside of an ancient schematic to pick up a piece
Shatter an Echo Shard that has been fractured 3 times to reduce negative effects
tetra.advancements.spelunking.loot_ruins: Use a tier 6 hammer with silk touch to harvest blocks from the ruins
tetra.advancements.spelunking.pristine_s: Find a pristine gem in a geode and use it to socket a sword or a tool
tetra.advancements.spelunking.refill_cel: Use a transfer unit or a core extractor to fully charge a thermal cell
tetra.advancements.spelunking.use_bolt.d: Use a bolt to bind a tool or a sword, then use the tweak tab in a workbench to change the stats of the item
tetra.advancements.spelunking.find_scrol: Find a scroll in the world or purchase one from a villager

Purchase all of the treatises on tool efficiency from the villagers

§7Sometimes sold by villagers that have leveled up

Purchase all of the treatises on material expertise from the villagers

§7Sometimes sold by villagers above level 2
Find a gilding scroll in a nether fortress
Find a howling blade schematic in a dungeon
Find a sturdy guard schematic in a dungeon
Find a throwing knife schematic in a dungeon
Find a chapter of Tools of War in a bastion remnant, or barter for one with a piglin
tetra.advancements.spelunking.find_ruins:
Buy a map marking an ancient ruin from a level 2 cartographer

§7§oDid they just sell me the same map twice?
tetra.advancements.upgrades.root.title: Basic Tinkering (§7Tetra§r)
tetra.advancements.upgrades.root.descrip:
Craft a mallet from two sticks and two planks
 
Item Reward: 全息球
tetra.advancements.upgrades.place_holosp:
Shift + right-click to place the holosphere in the world, right click the placed block to open the holosphere UI
 
§7A holosphere placed near a workbench (5x5x5) allows lookups as if it was in the player's inventory
Upgrade a bow in a workbench
tetra.advancements.upgrades.shield_upgra: Upgrade a shield in a workbench
tetra.advancements.upgrades.double_heade: When using double headed tools (e.g. pickaxes, axes, hammers) it's only the head with the highest value that will be considered when determining damage or harvest tier/efficiency.
tetra.advancements.upgrades.hammer_2.des:
Upgrade your hammer to a double-sided stone hammer (any type of stone), the stone hammer provides tier two hammering capabilities

§7Can be crafted in a crafting table in the same way as wooden hammers
tetra.advancements.upgrades.hammer_3.des:
Craft a double-sided iron hammer, the iron hammer provides tier three hammering capabilities

§7Can only be crafted in a workbench, requires a secondary hammer in your inventory to craft
tetra.advancements.upgrades.hammer_4.des:
Craft a double-sided blackstone hammer, the blackstone hammer provides tier four hammering capabilities

§7An upgraded handle or a binding will provide enough integrity to support a blackstone hammer
tetra.advancements.upgrades.hammer_5.des:
Craft a double-sided obsidian hammer using an upgraded forge hammer, the obsidian hammer provides tier five hammering capabilities

§7Information about the forge hammer can be found in the spelunking advancements tab
tetra.advancements.upgrades.hammer_6.des: Craft a double-sided netherite hammer using a fully upgraded forge hammer, the netherite hammer provides tier six hammering capabilities
tetra.advancements.upgrades.repairs.desc:
Modular items can be repaired in a workbench.
 * Repairing an item will require materials (and appropriate tools) for one of its modules
 * Repairing will cycle over all of the item's modules
 * Repairing magically unstable modules will cost experience
 * Each repair fully restores the durability of the item
tetra.advancements.upgrades.sword_hone.d: Use a sword until it can be honed, then hone it at a workbench
tetra.advancements.upgrades.sword_hone_p: Hone the speed or damage of a hilt or a blade to level 5
tetra.advancements.upgrades.sword_improv: Apply an improvement to a sword module, and then hone that improvement to increase its effect
tetra.advancements.upgrades.sword_integr: Upgrade a sword's hilt or strengthen the sword with a binding to increase its integrity
tetra.advancements.upgrades.sword_upgrad: Place a vanilla sword in a workbench and upgrade it
tetra.advancements.upgrades.toolbelt.des: Craft a very basic toolbelt from four pieces of string
tetra.advancements.upgrades.tool_upgrade: Place a vanilla tool such as a pickaxe, an axe or a hoe in a workbench and upgrade it
tetra.advancements.upgrades.workbench.de: Upgrade a crafting table by right-clicking it with a mallet
tetra.advancements.upgrades.rack.title: Within Reach
tetra.advancements.upgrades.rack.descrip: Place a rack near a workbench for easy access to your tools
tetra.improvement.destabilized/haunted.d: This module has been haunted and will sometimes turn against the item's wielder! Will disappear over time.
tetra.module.holo/frame.name: Ancient frame
tetra.module.holo/frame.description: A frame of what appears to be some sort of metal hosts the various parts that make up the sphere.
tetra.module.holo/core.name: Dim core
tetra.module.holo/core.description: At the center of the sphere sits a small cylinder, it's warm to the touch. Everything within the sphere is in some way connected to the cylinder.
tetra/schematic/holo/scanner/sweeper.des:
Harness the properies of an §lEye of Ender§r to restore the sweeping functionality of the sphere's scanner.
While the sphere is in the player's inventory it will scan for ruins in the direction that the player is facing. The sweeper emits a low pitch hum when there are ruins ahead, more information is displayed while the sphere is held.
tetra.improvement.scanner/sweeper.name: Sweeper
tetra.improvement.scanner/sweeper.descri: Allows the sphere to periodically scan the surrounding area for ancient ruins.
tetra/schematic/holo/scanner/percussion_: An array of crystals within the scanner have been shattered, replacing them with amethyst shards may restore the holosphere's long range scanning capabilities
tetra.improvement.scanner/percussion_sca: Allows the sphere to perform long range scans for ancient ruins.
tetra.module.holo/scanner.description: Appears to host different types of location-based functionality within the sphere, but several parts appear to be missing or broken.
tetra.interactions.scan_toggle_on.label: Enable scanner
tetra.interactions.scan_toggle_off.label: Disable scanner
tetra.module.holo/repo.description: Holds information about how tools and weapons may be crafted and modified.
With the use of two bolts it's possible to improve the scanner so that some of it's properties become tweakable.
tetra.improvement.scanner/adjustable.des: The behaviour of the scanner can be tweaked.
tetra.tweak.scanner/adjustable_range.too: Change priority between higher scan range or shorter delay between sweeps.
tetra.tweak.scanner/adjustable_span.tool: Change priority between vertical or horizontal span.
tetra.enchantment.missing_description: The effects of this enchantment are unknown
enchantment.minecraft.vanishing_curse.de: Causes the item to disappear if the wielder dies
enchantment.minecraft.fire_aspect.desc: Hitting entities sets them on fire
enchantment.minecraft.unbreaking.desc: Reduces the chance for the item to take damage
enchantment.minecraft.flame.desc: Hitting entities sets them on fire
enchantment.minecraft.riptide.desc: Propels the wielder forward when used in water or rain
enchantment.minecraft.impaling.desc: Deal increased damage to wet or aquatic entities
enchantment.minecraft.channeling.desc: Calls down lightning when thrown at an entity during a thunderstorm
